column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2021
column14: I love to use this foam on my face. It also works great when I remove makeup after using coconut oil and initially get everything loosened up. I love Dove, Period. But this product is really gentle on my face. I don't have any breakouts and any irritation at all. This is a great soap!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2021
column14: I have been using the Dove body foam product for a long time now and this one is my next favorite (lavender is my most fav).  The scent is not overpowering at all and has a slight floral scent.  It works great for my sensitive skin too, not leaving my skin dry or irritated.  This bundle is definitely work the value!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2021
column14: I thought I was getting a pretty decent deal by buying in bulk but when it arrived the whole box was gooey. I had to put it in my sink and wash every bottle because soap leaked all over it.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
column14: The foaming bath gel has a nice light scent but it takes a lot to get it to foam and remain lathered. They even mention on the bottle to use generously and you do have to.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
column14: I have eczema on my hands and feet as well as very dry skin, especially in the winter. This body wash is absolutely amazing for your skin. I even use it as a face wash. Super hydrating with a light scent. Will repurchase many times over I’m sure.

column6: Feels amazing Smells amazing cleanses gently
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2021
column14: This is a wonderful product extension of the Dove line!!! Luxurious, wonderful fragrance, made for sensitive skin and at a reasonable price for a change!!! Thank you

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
column14: This product smell great and leaves my skin very soft. I love that has a pump and can sit still. The downside is that it does not lather that great.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2021
column14: This foam wash is useless, it doesn't feel like you are bathing with a soap it just feels like you are rubbing something over your body.
